title: X is after your life and you have Y to protect you
body:
X
*the first two letters of your first name will be the first two letters of the name of the champion hunting you. If they land inbetween two names, take the former one*

Y
*the first two letters of your last name will be the first two letters of the name of your bodyguard. If they land inbetween two names, take the latter one*

How screwed are you?

replies.body:
Ke: {{champion:85}} 
Sm: Smurf {{champion:64}}

Da: Hunted by Darius.

Sh:  Protected by Shen or Shyvana.

I think I am good, I mean Darius is scary, but I either get Shen, someone who's job it is to protect people. Or a lady who can freaking turn into a Dragon. Either way I am set.
Well I mean, one guillotine after 5 stacks and you're dead

I honestly don't think I would survive Darius hitting me five times with an axe.

I am just hoping shyv will eat him first.

NI: Hunted by, {{champion:76}}  the Queen of the Jungle

RO: Protected by {{champion:266}}... Title I know not, but he can fly so I feel better now...

And he boosted an Army to Victory so I am Set
Idk, Nid can throw her spears pretty far...
I can walk left or right  pretty quickly
Just hope the spears don't glitch and fly at you while invisible.

Hunter: Singed
Bodyguard: Lucian
I guess I'm fucked. 
You can't shoot poison
Teemo shoots poison

{{champion:80}} is hunting me

{{champion:53}} is guarding me.

Let's hope this Blitzcrank is at least silver 3
no you'd have {{champion:7}}
Ah. I misinterpreted the rules. Well i don't think i would have any trouble staying alive then. Plus LB isn't hard on the eyes.
Hard on the eyes?
You've never heard that phrase? Hard on the eyes means that they are not pleasant to look at. Lb on the other hand is easy on the eyes.

Yeah but

Why does that matter in protecting you?

Because it makes my time on the run more pleasant. I would rather have a hot grill than someone like fizz to keep me company over a likely long period of time. Also i wouldn't be the slightest bit worried about getting caught either, with 2 cunning minds and clones to work i'm sure i could outsmart that blue buffoon forever.

Hmm I guess that makes sense

and you're a cunning mind? Do tell :)

That isn't something terrible easy to "tell". But i have a very good understanding of the human mind and how people think. I can predict their next actions a lot of the time and figure out where they are weak. I devise strategies when in any sort of competition around said weaknesses and consistencies in human behavior.

Oh wow! That sounds really cool! 

I can kinda do that but I don't consider myself a mind reader artist yet.

It comes largely due to my personality type. I'm very cautious so before i engage in conversation i need to gauge what all is acceptable for the particular situation i am in. So i sit quietly and observe peoples behavior and speech patterns to gauge how i should conduct myself. If i can't do that i will appear to be really awkward and uncomfortable (because i will be). I've honed my observation skills to a point where it would be very scary to be on my bad side because i know exactly what makes you tick, but it's also good to be on my good side since i know what makes you tick and that makes my very empathetic.
What MBTI and Enneagram are you, by any chance, if you have looked into that?

I don't remember. But i know it's the least common one. I just did it and i'm INFP -A/-T for the MBTI. And the other one i'm 5w6. The INFP is the least common of all personality types making up 4% of the population.

lol i wish

but no, sadly :(
Wait are you a grill?
I used to be an MBTI geek and it's actually INFJ that is the rarest. I'm an INTJ myself, among the most rare, but most rare of only females are considered.
The death ez real

Hunted By: Taric
Guarded by:{{champion:92}} {{champion:68}} ??? Not sure, it's Ro.
It'd be Rumble.

Al; Alistar is hunting me.
Da; Darius is defending me.

Good thing I love bouncy houses! But I dunno if Darius does so much...

{{champion:266}}  Is trying to kill my ass, and
{{champion:31}}  is protecting me
I'm fine boiz >:)

De- Diana
As- Ashe

I think I'll be fine at the Queen's Castle. Just gotta watch out for Tryndamere.
Nah Diana is gonna murder than Ashe
Actually she can't, there'll be a "No Heresy" sign at the front door.
lolol

So going off alphabetical champ list I got:
Kog Maw chasing me but Master Yi is there to protect me.

Yeah I think I'm safe.  Heck maybe I'll just grab a garbage can lid and just defend myself :P
{{champion:40}} is after me and {{champion:51}} is protecting me. I think I'm good.
but its an ad janna......{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

{{champion:238}} hunts me

{{champion:17}} protects me

kappa


just thought that would be a hilarious outcome.
